text: to kya vah shakhs jis ke seene ko khuda ne (qubool) islaam ke lie kushaada kar diya hai to vah apane paravaradigaar (kee hidaayat) kee raushanee par (chalata) hai magar gumaraahon ke baraabar ho sakata hai aphasos to un logon par hai jinake dil khuda kee yaad se (gaafil hokar) sakht ho gae hain
